Title: PEAR Archive_Tar: Remote code execution vulnerability
Synopsis:
A buffer overflow in the PEAR module Archive_Tar might allow local
    or remote attacker(s) to execute arbitrary code.

Background.Text: This class provides handling of tar files in PHP.

Description.Text: An issue was discovered in the PEAR module Archive_Tarâ€™s handling of file paths within Tar achives.

Impact.Text: A local or remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

Workaround.Text: Avoid handling untrusted Tar files with this package until you have upgraded to a non-vulnerable version.
